innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: Stay at the forefront of emerging technologies and contribute to the evolution of modern web development.

impact.title: Social Impact
impact.description: Create technological solutions that improve users' lives and contribute to the common good.

excellence.title: Technical Excellence
excellence.description: Develop performant, scalable and maintainable applications following best practices.

vision.title: Long-term Vision
vision.description: Build a sustainable career in web development with a strategic and innovative vision.

philosophy.title: My Philosophy
philosophy.quote: Technology must serve humanity. My goal is to create digital experiences that not only work perfectly, but truly enrich the lives of their users.
